name: Spooky Catdoption Agency
description:
Spooky Catdoption Agency

Made in 48 hours for the New Mexico Game Jam

The game is designed for 2 players

The rules:
-there is a deck with 7 cats and 7 clients in it.
-the deck is face down.
-the cats have 3 attributes. The clients have a preference for each attribute.
-players start by picking a card.
-if the player draws a cat, they put it into their hand. If it is a client, it is put on the table to share
-each turn players can choose to either pick up a card or use their cat on a client
-the players score points by however many matching attributes they have with the client. They are deducted for any attributes they have that are hated by the client. The two cards are then removed from play. 
-play until there is no more clients left 
-points are tallied up and whoever has the most points wins
